manifest.name: @ts-morph/common

scripts.build: npm run build:declarations && npm run build:node && npm run build:deno
scripts.build:node: rimraf dist && npm run createLibFile && npm run rollup && deno run -A scripts/bundleLocalTs.ts
scripts.build:deno: rimraf ../../deno/common && rimraf dist-deno && npm run rollup -- --environment BUILD:deno && npm run build:declarations && deno run -A scripts/buildDeno.ts

manifest.readme:
# @ts-morph/common

Common functionality for [ts-morph](../ts-morph) and [@ts-morph/bootstrap](../bootstrap).

Please do not depend on this library!
